entry.title: Adding New BIP Editors
entry.summary: Matt Corallo has accepted the nomination to become a BIP Editor, contingent on two conditions: all editors will have equal privileges, and there will be at least three active editors by the end of the selection process. In his communication, he expresses a preference for additional BIP Editors, naming Kanzure and Ruben as his top choices due to their extensive experience and contributions to development discussions and the BIPs repository, respectively. He highlights Kanzure's encyclopedic knowledge and long-standing role in a similar capacity, as well as Ruben's detailed familiarity with the BIPs repository and their track records of impartial assessment and adherence to the established standards of the BIP process. Corallo is optimistic about collaborating with them to address the 137 open pull requests, pending community support for these appointments.
